      public BossPlane()

  • Method Details

    • updatePosition

      public void updatePosition()
      Updates the position of the boss plane and its shield. Ensures the plane stays within bounds.
      Overrides:
      updatePosition in class ActiveActorDestructible

    • updateShieldPosition

      private void updateShieldPosition()
      Updates the shield's position to follow the boss plane.

    • getShieldDisplay

      public ShieldDisplay getShieldDisplay()
      Gets the shield display associated with the boss plane.
      Returns:
      the ShieldDisplay instance.

    • updateActor

      public void updateActor()
      Updates the boss plane's position and manages shield activation and deactivation.
      Specified by:
      updateActor in class ActiveActorDestructible

    • fireProjectile

      public ActiveActorDestructible fireProjectile()
      Fires a projectile from the boss plane if the firing condition is met.
      Specified by:
      fireProjectile in class FighterPlane
      Returns:
      an instance of BossProjectile, or null if the boss does not fire in the current frame.

    • shouldTakeDamage

      protected boolean shouldTakeDamage()
      Determines if the boss plane should take damage. Returns false if the shield is active.
      Overrides:
      shouldTakeDamage in class ActiveActorDestructible
      Returns:
      true if the boss can take damage, false otherwise.

    • bossFiresInCurrentFrame

      private boolean bossFiresInCurrentFrame()
      Determines whether the boss fires a projectile in the current frame.
      Returns:
      true if the boss fires, false otherwise.

    • shieldShouldBeActivated

      private boolean shieldShouldBeActivated()
      Determines whether the shield should be activated based on probability.
      Returns:
      true if the shield should be activated, false otherwise.

    • shieldExhausted

      private boolean shieldExhausted()
      Checks if the shield has been active for the maximum allowed frames.
      Returns:
      true if the shield duration is exhausted, false otherwise.

    • activateShield

      private void activateShield()
      Activates the boss's shield.

    • deactivateShield

      private void deactivateShield()
      Deactivates the boss's shield and resets shield activation frames.

    • updateShield

      private void updateShield()
      Manages the state of the boss's shield, including activation and deactivation.

    • getNextMove

      private int getNextMove()
      Retrieves the next movement value from the boss's move pattern.
      Returns:
      the next move value.

    • initializeMovePattern

      private void initializeMovePattern()
      Initializes the movement pattern for the boss plane. Alternates between vertical velocities and stationary moves.
